scripts.test:coverage: cd backend && npx vitest run --coverage && cd ../frontend && npx vitest run --coverage --testTimeout=20000
scripts.sonar: npm run test:coverage && npm run sonar:scan
scripts.sonar:scan: npm run sonar:scan:backend && npm run sonar:scan:frontend
scripts.sonar:main: npm run test:coverage && npm run sonar:scan
scripts.sonar:develop: npm run test:coverage && cd backend && bash ../scripts/sonar-scanner-wrapper.sh -Dsonar.projectKey=TeamHub-backend-develop -Dsonar.projectName='TeamHub Backend (develop)' && cd ../frontend && bash ../scripts/sonar-scanner-wrapper.sh -Dsonar.projectKey=TeamHub-frontend-develop -Dsonar.projectName='TeamHub Frontend (develop)'
